typeDescription.name: de.averbis.types.health.ExternalCoreAnnotation
typeDescription.description: Core annotation for the simplified health typesystem.

featureDescription.name: language
featureDescription.description: Language of the document.

featureDescription.name: version
featureDescription.description: Version of the Health-Discovery.

featureDescription.name: label
featureDescription.description: The type of the entity. E.g., PERSON, LOCATION etc.

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: This feature provides the text of the annotated mention.

featureDescription.name: subject
featureDescription.description: An annotation representing the subject of the relation.

featureDescription.name: predicate
featureDescription.description: An annotation representing the predicate of the relation.

featureDescription.name: object
featureDescription.description: An annotation representing the object of the relation.

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: Type of the relation.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.types.health.DateInterval
typeDescription.description: Captures a DateInterval with startDate and endDate.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.types.health.Anatomy
typeDescription.description: Contains information about anatomy.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.types.health.BiologicallyDerivedProduct
typeDescription.description: Contains information about the biological product of CD34-positive stem cells.

featureDescription.name: quantity
featureDescription.description: The volume of the product which was transplanted.

featureDescription.name: time
featureDescription.description: Temporal information (time, date or date interval) about the transplantation. kind: Possible values (default is underlined): null, TIME, DATE, DATEINTERVAL value: value of the temporal information

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.types.health.BloodPressure
typeDescription.description: Information about blood pressure.

featureDescription.name: systolic
featureDescription.description: Measurement of systolic blood pressure.

featureDescription.name: diastolic
featureDescription.description: Measurement of diastolic blood pressure.

featureDescription.name: interpretation
featureDescription.description: Interpretation of fact depending on reference values or interpretation in text (also possible without fact). Possible values (default is underlined): null | normal | abnormal | high | low

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.types.health.Chimerism
typeDescription.description: Information about chimerism.

featureDescription.name: date
featureDescription.description: Date of chimerism analysis.

featureDescription.name: kind
featureDescription.description: The kind of the actual chimerism. Possible values (default is underlined): null | COMPLETE | MIXED

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: Numeric value of chimerism.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.types.health.ClinicalSectionKeyword
typeDescription.description: Keyword found to spawn the clincal section.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.types.health.ClinicalSection
typeDescription.description: Section information for clinical documents.

featureDescription.name: label
featureDescription.description: The label of the section, e.g. "LaboratorySection", "MedicationSection", "AnamnesisSection"

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.types.health.DayTimeDoseFrequency
typeDescription.description: Details of dose frequency for a specific time of day.

featureDescription.name: morning
featureDescription.description: Number of drug units in the morning.

featureDescription.name: midday
featureDescription.description: Number of drug units at midday.

featureDescription.name: evening
featureDescription.description: Number of drug units in the evening.

featureDescription.name: atNight
featureDescription.description: Number of drug units at night or bedtime.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.types.health.DeidentifiedDocument
typeDescription.description: Deidentified version of the document.

featureDescription.name: kind
featureDescription.description: The kind of method applied in order to deidentify the document (i.e. crossout or tag).

featureDescription.name: deidentifiedText
featureDescription.description: The deidentified version of the document.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.types.health.Department
typeDescription.description: Information about the department typeof the document.

featureDescription.name: departmentType
featureDescription.description: Additional information about the department type. Currently limited to the information, if the department is the sending department of a clinical note. Note: there may be more than one sending department, e.g. "Division of Hematology and Oncology". Possible values (default is underlined): null | sender

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.types.health.Diagnosis
typeDescription.description: Main type for diagnoses.

featureDescription.name: approach
featureDescription.description: Information about the text mining approach used to generate the annotation. Possible values: DictionaryLookup | SimilarityMatching | DocumentClassification

featureDescription.name: belongsTo
featureDescription.description: Indicates, whether the diagnosis belongs to a donor or recipient (e.g. in case of transplantations) or to a family member. Possible values (default is underlined): null | DONOR | FAMILY | RECIPIENT

featureDescription.name: clinicalStatus
featureDescription.description: Clinical status of the actual diagnosis. Possible values (default is underlined): null | ACTIVE | RESOLVED

featureDescription.name: confidence
featureDescription.description: For approaches using machine learning, the confidence is calculated that the respective annotation has been correctly generated. Possible value range: 0-1 Note: Annotations generated with non-machine learning approaches such as terminology mappings (approach = "DictionaryLookup") are reflected with a confidence value of 0.

featureDescription.name: kind
featureDescription.description: The kind of the diagnosis. Possible values (default is underlined): null | main | secondary

featureDescription.name: onsetDate
featureDescription.description: The onset date of the diagnosis, if given in the text. Format: YYYY-MM-DD: Year-Month-Day with leading zeros (e.g. 2020-02-17) Please note: The onsetDate is only annotated if the pear component "Disease Onset Date" is integrated in the text analysis pipeline used. The preconfigured pipelines do not contain this component, thus the value of the onset feature is represented as null.

featureDescription.name: laterality
featureDescription.description: The laterality of the diagnosis. Possible values (default is underlined): null | RIGHT | LEFT | BOTH

featureDescription.name: verificationStatus
featureDescription.description: Verification status of the actual diagnosis. Possible values (default is underlined): null | NEGATED | ASSURED | SUSPECTED | DIFFERENTIAL

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.types.health.DiagnosisCandidate
typeDescription.description: A candidate for a DRG coding.

featureDescription.name: approach
featureDescription.description: The approach that generated this candidate.

featureDescription.name: belongsTo
featureDescription.description: Diagnosis candidate belongs to patient or other person (family anamnesis). Possible values include 'patient' or 'family'.

featureDescription.name: clinicalStatus
featureDescription.description: Clinical status of the coding candidate.

featureDescription.name: conceptID
featureDescription.description: The id of the diagnosis candidate.

featureDescription.name: confidence
featureDescription.description: For approaches using machine learning, the confidence is calculated that the respective annotation has been correctly generated. Possible value range: 0-1.

featureDescription.name: dictCanon
featureDescription.description: An optional preferred term corresponding to the given id.

featureDescription.name: verificationStatus
featureDescription.description: Verification status of the diagnosis candidate.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.types.health.DoseForm
typeDescription.description: The type of dose form.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.types.health.DoseFrequency
typeDescription.description: The taking interval and amount of doses.

featureDescription.name: interval
featureDescription.description: The taking interval of a medication, e.g. day, week, month etc.

featureDescription.name: totalCount
featureDescription.description: Total count of taken drug units per interval.

featureDescription.name: totalDose
featureDescription.description: Total dose of taken drug per interval.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.types.health.Drug
typeDescription.description: The ingredient and strength of a drug.

featureDescription.name: ingredient
featureDescription.description: Ingredient of the drug.

featureDescription.name: strength
featureDescription.description: Strength of the drug.

featureDescription.name: stage
featureDescription.description: Stage of the he ECOG (Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group) Performance Status (numeric scale).

featureDescription.name: percentage
featureDescription.description: The percentage represented as a measurement.

featureDescription.name: status
featureDescription.description: The status of the Estrogen expression. Possible values (default is underlined): -,+,++,+++

featureDescription.name: primaryGrade
featureDescription.description: The primary grade (not always available).

featureDescription.name: score
featureDescription.description: The combined score.

featureDescription.name: secondaryGrade
featureDescription.description: The secondary grade (not always available).

featureDescription.name: continuanceStatus
featureDescription.description: GvHD status. Possible values (default is underlined): null | ACUTE | CHRONIC

featureDescription.name: date
featureDescription.description: The date of the diagnosis.

featureDescription.name: grade
featureDescription.description: Grade of the GvHD diagnosis. Possible values (default is underlined): null I | II | III | IV

featureDescription.name: organ
featureDescription.description: Organ diagnosed with GvHD. Possible values (default is underlined): null | SKIN | LIVER | INTESTINAL | EYE | LUNG | CONNECTIVE TISSUE | MUCOSA | VAGINAL

featureDescription.name: stage
featureDescription.description: Stage of the GvHD diagnosis. Possible values (default is underlined): null | 1 | 2 | 3 | 4 | LIMITED | EXTENDED

featureDescription.name: percentage
featureDescription.description: The percentage represented as a measurement.

featureDescription.name: status
featureDescription.description: The status of the HER2 expression. Possible values (default is underlined): -,+,++,+++

featureDescription.name: female
featureDescription.description: Maternal HLA manifestation.

featureDescription.name: male
featureDescription.description: Paternal HLA manifestation.

featureDescription.name: date
featureDescription.description: Date of observation.

featureDescription.name: samplingDate
featureDescription.description: Date of sampling.

featureDescription.name: receiptDate
featureDescription.description: Date of receipt of sample.

featureDescription.name: belongsTo
featureDescription.description: Role of the person engaged in a HLA-typed human primary cells transplantation procedure. Possible values are 'RECIPIENT' or 'DONOR'.

featureDescription.name: alleleGroup
featureDescription.description: Allele group of actual HLA.

featureDescription.name: expressionNote
featureDescription.description: Suffix to code changes in expression.

featureDescription.name: noncodingRegionVariant
featureDescription.description: Differences in non-coding region.

featureDescription.name: protein
featureDescription.description: Specific protein of actual HLA.

featureDescription.name: synonymousDNA
featureDescription.description: Synonymous DNA substitution within the coding region.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.types.health.Hospitalisation
typeDescription.description: Patients admission and discharge date.

featureDescription.name: admissionDate
featureDescription.description: Date of admission to hospital.

featureDescription.name: dischargeDate
featureDescription.description: Date of discharge from hospital.

featureDescription.name: dateInterval
featureDescription.description: The date interval of the irradiation therapy.

featureDescription.name: dose
featureDescription.description: The dose.

featureDescription.name: kind
featureDescription.description: The irradiation dose kind. Possible values (default is underlined): null | FRACTIONAL

featureDescription.name: belongsTo
featureDescription.description: Indicates, whether the laboratory value belongs to a donor or recipient (e.g. in case of transplantations) or to a family member. Possible values (default is underlined): null | DONOR | FAMILY | RECIPIENT

featureDescription.name: fact
featureDescription.description: Measurement of actual laboratory value.

featureDescription.name: factAssessment
featureDescription.description: A optional relative assessment of the fact.

featureDescription.name: interpretation
featureDescription.description: Interpretation of fact depending on reference values or interpretation in text (also possible without fact). Possible values (default is underlined): null | normal | abnormal | high | low

featureDescription.name: parameter
featureDescription.description: Parameter of actual laboratory value.

featureDescription.name: upperLimit
featureDescription.description: Upper reference value of actual laboratory value.

featureDescription.name: qualitativeValue
featureDescription.description: Qualitative value of the actual laboratory value.

featureDescription.name: lowerLimit
featureDescription.description: Lower reference value of actual laboratory value.

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: The numeric value of the measurement.

featureDescription.name: normalizedUnit
featureDescription.description: Normalized string value of the unit.

featureDescription.name: normalizedValue
featureDescription.description: Normalized value of the measurement. This value is the result of the transformation of the numeric value according to the transformation of the unit to its standard unit.

featureDescription.name: unit
featureDescription.description: The unit of the measurement.

featureDescription.name: administrations
featureDescription.description: The routes of administration of this medication.

featureDescription.name: atc
featureDescription.description: The ATC Code of the medication.

featureDescription.name: brandName
featureDescription.description: The brand name of the medication.

featureDescription.name: date
featureDescription.description: Temporal information (time, date or date interval) about the medication. kind: Possible values: null, TIME, DATE, DATEINTERVAL value: value of the temporal information

featureDescription.name: doseForm
featureDescription.description: Dose form of the actual medication.

featureDescription.name: doseFrequency
featureDescription.description: Dose frequency of the actual medication. Possible forms are a general DoseFrequency or the more detailed DayTimeDoseFrequency, WeekDayDoseFrequency, TimeMeasurementDoseFrequency etc.

featureDescription.name: status
featureDescription.description: Status of the medication. Possible values: null | NEGATED | CONSIDERED | INACTIVE | INTENDED | UNKNOWN

featureDescription.name: category
featureDescription.description: Category of the medication. Possible values: null | ADMISSION | ALLERGY | INPATIENT | DISCHARGE | FAMILY | CONDITIONING_TREATMENT

featureDescription.name: termTypes
featureDescription.description: Additional information on clinical drug, e.g. semantic clinical drug (RxNorm TermType).

featureDescription.name: confidence
featureDescription.description: For approaches using machine learning, the confidence is calculated that the respective annotation has been correctly generated. Possible value range: 0-1.

featureDescription.name: stage
featureDescription.description: Stage of the NYHA (New York Heart Association) Classification (numeric scale).

featureDescription.name: status
featureDescription.description: Describes the status of the physical therapy. Possible values: null | PLANNED | CANCELED | COMPLETED | NEGATED

featureDescription.name: laterality
featureDescription.description: The laterality of the diagnosis. Possible values: null | RIGHT | LEFT | BOTH

featureDescription.name: kind
featureDescription.description: Describes the type of Organism, e.g. BACTERIA | FUNGI | VIRUS

featureDescription.name: correspondence
featureDescription.description: Contains "sender" if the organization is detected as sending party of the record.

featureDescription.name: organizationType
featureDescription.description: Type of the organization. Possible values: general hospital | university hospital | specialist clinic | rehabilitation clinic | physician's admitting hospital

featureDescription.name: category
featureDescription.description: Classification of the pathology report by organ entity, e.g. "MAMMA", "COLON", "PROSTATE" with confidence.

featureDescription.name: diagnosis
featureDescription.description: The code of the relevant diagnosis based on ICD-10, e.g. "C50.9" for malignant neoplasm of breast of unspecified site.

featureDescription.name: grading
featureDescription.description: The grading of the tumor. Possible values: null | U | 1 | 2 | 3 | 4

featureDescription.name: location
featureDescription.description: Further specification of the metastasis: Pulmonary (PUL), Bone marrow (MAR), Osseous (OSS), Pleura (PLE), Hepatic (HEP), Peritoneum (PER), Brain (BRA), Adrenals (ADR), Lymph nodes (LYM), Skin (SKI), Others (OTH)

featureDescription.name: lymphnodesAffected
featureDescription.description: The amount of affected lymph nodes.

featureDescription.name: lymphnodesTested
featureDescription.description: The amount of tested lymph nodes.

featureDescription.name: metastasis
featureDescription.description: M-Value according to TNM classification.

featureDescription.name: morphology
featureDescription.description: Morphology code based in ICD-O, e.g. "8520/3" with confidence.

featureDescription.name: node
featureDescription.description: N-Value according to TNM classification.

featureDescription.name: rClass
featureDescription.description: Residual classification (R-Classification) of the tumor. Possible values: null | Rx | R0 | R1 | R2

featureDescription.name: sentinelLymphnodesAffected
featureDescription.description: The amount of affected sentinel lymph nodes.

featureDescription.name: sentinelLymphnodesTested
featureDescription.description: The amount of tested sentinel lymph nodes.

featureDescription.name: side
featureDescription.description: The laterality of the pathology item, e.g. R,L,B,U

featureDescription.name: topography
featureDescription.description: Topography code based on ICD-O, e.g. "C50.9"

featureDescription.name: thickness
featureDescription.description: Information about the tumor thickness.

featureDescription.name: tumor
featureDescription.description: T-Value according to TNM classification.

featureDescription.name: lymphaticInvasion
featureDescription.description: The invasion of the cancer to the lymphatic system.

featureDescription.name: vascularInvasion
featureDescription.description: The invasion of the cancer to the vascular system.

featureDescription.name: perineuralInvasion
featureDescription.description: The invasion of the cancer to the space surrounding a nerve.

featureDescription.name: resultDate
featureDescription.description: The date of the result/findings.

featureDescription.name: scores
featureDescription.description: List of different scores, e.g. Gleason Score.

featureDescription.name: gleasonScore
featureDescription.description: Highest GleasonScore.

featureDescription.name: deathDate
featureDescription.description: Death date of the patient.

featureDescription.name: deceased
featureDescription.description: Information as to whether the patient is deceased. Possible values: false, true

featureDescription.name: firstName
featureDescription.description: The first part (before the semicolon) of the matching preferred term in the terminology "patientnames".

featureDescription.name: gender
featureDescription.description: Gender of the patient. Possible values (default is underlined): null, female, male

featureDescription.name: lastName
featureDescription.description: The last part (after the semicolon) of the matching preferred term in the terminology "patientnames".

featureDescription.name: date
featureDescription.description: The date of the procedure.

featureDescription.name: laterality
featureDescription.description: The laterality of the procedure. Possible values: null | RIGHT | LEFT | BOTH

featureDescription.name: status
featureDescription.description: Describes the status of the procedure. Possible values: null | PLANNED | CANCELED | COMPLETED | NEGATED

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.types.health.ProcedureCandidate
typeDescription.description: A candidate for an OPS coding.

featureDescription.name: approach
featureDescription.description: The approach that generated this candidate.

featureDescription.name: conceptID
featureDescription.description: The id of the procedure candidate.

featureDescription.name: dictCanon
featureDescription.description: An optional preferred term corresponding to the given id.

featureDescription.name: confidence
featureDescription.description: For approaches using machine learning, the confidence is calculated that the respective annotation has been correctly generated. Possible value range: 0-1.

featureDescription.name: percentage
featureDescription.description: The percentage represented as a measurement.

featureDescription.name: status
featureDescription.description: The status of the Progesterone expression. Possible values: -,+,++,+++

featureDescription.name: axis
featureDescription.description: The axis value of the actual refraction.

featureDescription.name: cylinder
featureDescription.description: The cylinder value of the actual refraction.

featureDescription.name: sphere
featureDescription.description: The spheric value of the actual refraction.

featureDescription.name: leftEye
featureDescription.description: Left eye’s visual acuity.

featureDescription.name: rightEye
featureDescription.description: Right eye’s visual acuity.

featureDescription.name: descriptions
featureDescription.description: Description text, if available.

featureDescription.name: identifier
featureDescription.description: Identifier of the specimen. Possible values: SINGLE (if only one specimen identified) or Number of Specimen (e.g. 1, 2, 3....)

featureDescription.name: laterality
featureDescription.description: Laterality of the specimen. Possible values: null | RIGHT | LEFT | BOTH

featureDescription.name: morphology
featureDescription.description: The morphology of the specimen, according to ICD-O (see Morphology for more details).

featureDescription.name: topography
featureDescription.description: The topography of the specimen, according to ICD-O. (see Topography for more details).

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: The numeric value of the measurement.

featureDescription.name: normalizedUnit
featureDescription.description: Normalized string value of the unit.

featureDescription.name: normalizedValue
featureDescription.description: Normalized value of the measurement. This value is the result of the transformation of the numeric value according to the transformation of the unit to its standard unit.

featureDescription.name: unit
featureDescription.description: The unit of the measurement.

featureDescription.name: leftEye
featureDescription.description: Tensio measurement of left eye.

featureDescription.name: rightEye
featureDescription.description: Tensio measurement of right eye.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.types.health.TNMBasic
typeDescription.description: The basic type of a TNM mention providing a value feature.

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: The value of the TNM mention.

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: The value of the TNM mention.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.types.health.TNMEntity
typeDescription.description: Abstract type for a TNM entity providing a label.

featureDescription.name: label
featureDescription.description: Label of the entity describing the type of the entity, e.g., LymphaticInvasion, VascularInvasion, PerineuralInvasion.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.types.health.TNMAdditional
typeDescription.description: Additional TNM mentions

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.types.health.TNMModifier
typeDescription.description: A modifier of a TNM element

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.types.health.TNMPostModifier
typeDescription.description: Postmodifier of an element: a, b, c. Among others subclassification of tumor size, e.g. T1a: tumor under 0.1cm

featureDescription.name: confidence
featureDescription.description: For approaches using machine learning, the confidence is calculated that the respective annotation has been correctly generated. Possible value range: 0-1.

featureDescription.name: confidence
featureDescription.description: For approaches using machine learning, the confidence is calculated that the respective annotation has been correctly generated. Possible value range: 0-1.

featureDescription.name: label
featureDescription.description: The label of the category, e.g. MAMMA, PROSTATA, COLON, MELANOMA, BASALIOM

featureDescription.name: modifier
featureDescription.description: Modifier of the tumor stage, e.g. a, b, c

featureDescription.name: stage
featureDescription.description: Numeric value of the tumor stage Possible values: NULL, "1","2","3","4","5"

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: Thickness of the tumor.

featureDescription.name: unit
featureDescription.description: The unit of the measurement. By default, the tumor thickness is presented in millimeters (mm).

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.types.health.TTY
typeDescription.description: RxNorm Term Type

featureDescription.name: kind
featureDescription.description: Kind of term type, e.g. SCD.

featureDescription.name: code
featureDescription.description: Term type code for actual medication.

featureDescription.name: description
featureDescription.description: Term type description for actual medication.

featureDescription.name: modifier
featureDescription.description: Describes the characteristic of a qualitative value. Possible values: null | ABNORMAL | ALTERNATING | BORDERLINE | CENTROMERE | CIRCULAR | CONTINUOUS | CYTOPLASMATIC | DEMONSTRABLE | HOMOGENEOUS | MODERATE | NOT_QUANTIFIABLE | NUCLEOLAR | PERINUCLEOLAR | QUANTIFIABLE | QUALITATIVE | STRONG | WEAK

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: Qualitative statement on a laboratory value. Possible values: null | 1- | - - | 2- | - - - | 3- | 1+ | ++| 2+| +++| 3+ | APPROPRIATE | EVIDENCE | NEGATIVE | NO_EVIDENCE | POSITIVE | SPECKLED | STAINING | UNKOWN

featureDescription.name: leftEye
featureDescription.description: Left eye’s visual acuity.

featureDescription.name: rightEye
featureDescription.description: Right eye’s visual acuity.

featureDescription.name: normalized
featureDescription.description: Kind of comment, e.g. "AR_NOT_POSSIBLE", "DOES_NOT_IMPROVE".

featureDescription.name: additionalInformation
featureDescription.description: Kind of comment, e.g. "AR_NOT_POSSIBLE", "DOES_NOT_IMPROVE".

featureDescription.name: correction
featureDescription.description: Normalized value of correction during measuring visual acuity.

featureDescription.name: fact
featureDescription.description: Normalized value of visual acuity.

featureDescription.name: meter
featureDescription.description: Visual acuity measured with blackboard.

featureDescription.name: pinHole
featureDescription.description: Visual acuity measured with pin hole.

featureDescription.name: refraction
featureDescription.description: The measured refraction.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.types.health.WeekDayDoseFrequency
typeDescription.description: Details of dose frequency for a specific weekday.

featureDescription.name: kind
featureDescription.description: Possible values: PHONE | FAX | EMAIL

featureDescription.name: kind
featureDescription.description: Possible values: PATIENTID | OTHER

featureDescription.name: kind
featureDescription.description: Possible values: STREET | ZIP | CITY | STATE | COUNTRY | ORGANIZATION | HOSPITAL

featureDescription.name: kind
featureDescription.description: possible values: PATIENT | DOCTOR | OTHER
